# thunder_vpn_ocsp_oper (Data Source)

`thunder_vpn_ocsp_oper`: Operational Status for the object ocsp

## Example Usage

```terraform
  address  = var.dut9049

  password = var.password
}

}
output "get_vpn_ocsp_oper" {
  value = ["${data.thunder_vpn_ocsp_oper.thunder_vpn_ocsp_oper}"]
}
```
